products.manufacturer: Isuzu Technical Center of America, Inc.

summary: ISUZU 1999 RODEO.  I PURCHASED THE VEHICLE ON 6-17-03 AND ON THE WAY HOME THE ABS LIGHT WENT ON.  WHEN I WENT TO SHUT OFF THE CAR THE MODULE KEPT RUNNING.  WE HAD TO POP THE ABS FUSE FOR IT TO STOP.  SO THE CAR WENT BACK THE NEXT DAY.  FROM THERE IT WENT TO AN ISUZU DEALER TO FIX.  THERE IS DEFINITELY A PROBLEM ISUZU NEEDS TO DEAL WITH.*JB
